Deer Jerky

Ingredients

  • 8 Tbs soy sauce
  • 8 Tbs worcestershire sauce
  • 2 Tbs catsup
  • 1/2 tsp pepper
  • 1/2 tsp onion salt
  • few drops liquid smoke
  • 1/2 tsp cajun spice
  • Deer meat

Instructions

  1. Marinate meat in mixture 45 mins
  2. Prepare jerky
